body:
Comment 10 by **john.haugland**: 
Hi, 

I recompiled the source code with GOARCH=368 instead of GOARCH=amd64. And yes, this 
worked! However, should it not be possible to use amd64 as architecture? 
My system consist of two dual-core AMD Opteron Processors 2216

I have attached the content of /proc/cpuinfo
Attachments: 1. cpuinfo.txt (2796 bytes)
